data.text:
No Yasser, I received an email from Shaun where Neil mentioned the following: 

If the case has already gone to the bureaus then we would have to remove all traces of this case from our database and then the client would need to recapture the case in full.

Then the bureaus will load any defendants that they donâ€™t already have.

Please would you log a ticket to remove the case and then request that the client reload the case in full.

And Shaun's response:

Could you please log this in order for dev to remove.

Harry, can you please get the client to recapture and make sure they capture the 2nd defendant this time.

And Hariettes response:

Please let me know as soon as it has been removed from our database before I tell the client that they can re-capture.


@yasserogier
